name: Manasis Refrain
description: Manasis Refrain is a 3D anime adventure-RPG set in a colorful fantasy world filled with equal measures mana and magic. Determined to combat the Dark Lord and his dastardly forces, civilization has established schools to specially train and educate promising young pupils. You are one such student on their first day at the academy - don't be late!

name: Houchou Shoujo Gensoukyoku
description: Houchou Shoujo Gensoukyoku, commonly known as Yume Nikki Gensou among the western community, is a Metroidvania-style fangame made by Atelier Izumi (AKA Studio Izumi).

name: Cogen: Sword of Rewind - Limited Edition
description:
Rewind, rethink, redo. Cogen is a brand-new kind of 2D action game where there's no time for death. Any hit you take is a death sentence in this side-scrolling 2D action game. But fear not! You may lack the HP to weather a beating, but you've got the Ouroboros System on your side. This futuristic technology kicks in the instant death embraces you and allows you to rewind up to 3 seconds of time. Slip up and wish you could take it back? Want to play around and experiment? Easy, just rewind the clock! Hone your skills through trial and error, and triumph over diabolical traps and legions of fearsome foes!

Cogen: Sword of Rewind - Limited Edition includes:
- Base game: Cogen: Sword of Rewind
- Luxury artbook
- Voice drama & mini soundtrack CD
- DLC: "Additional scenario & playable character: Akasha version"

name: Watataku
description:
When you approach Kuroki, interact to catch her.
Catching succeeds or fails depending on Kuroki's current speed and game progression.
If you catch Kuroki you win the game. Loses when the other characters catches Kuroki or Kuroki runs away.

name: Uta no Prince-sama: All Star for Nintendo Switch
description:
It's been a year and a half since Nanami Haruka graduated from Saotome Shining's school of performing arts. Having signed with Shining Studios, Nanami is constantly looking for her big break, however, it just hasn't come yet, and if she fails to write a brilliant song before the second year is up, her contract will be terminated.

Thirteen Princes are at her rescue, she is going to face a different challenges with each of them. With the senpai idols, she'll have to write something for the music festival, with the teachers from the previous series, she'll have to handle the direction of their changing relationship. And with the seven princes who graduates with her, she will have to write a song for all seven of them, however, her final partner is but one of these princes.

So who is your prince?

name: Flesh, Blood, & Concrete
description:
An RPG Maker horror game about a normal apartment building.
-
Content warnings: meat and disembodied gore, general horror elements, an allusion to suicide, and some existential dread.

name: Cute Invaders
description: Something great is coming! Something extremely Gigantic and Adorable!

name: Pollito & Xiang Xiang: Adventure in the Forest
description:
Pollito & Xiang Xiang: Adventure in the Forest is a family friendly adventure with RPG elements game, where you can control two characters (in single player or in online coop-multiplayer modes)

Your goal is to save the creatures of the planet while getting resources (paw coins) to fix your ship, improve your House and personalize your characters and mascots.

name: Galaxy Tales: Story of Rapunzel
description: Fight space pirates with Rapunzel, the Android with the best hair in the world! To protect the precious shelter where the Jimo race lives, the cute alien Rose and Android Rapunzel must go up to the ground floor.

name: Social Wars
description: The only thing that sets this apart from other games is the fact that this game does not use 'energy' points that most Facebook games use, which takes time, certain items, and/or money. Another rather nice feature in the game is cash. Players can use cash in buying mechs, expanding your army and more.

name: Social Empires
description: Social Empire is a game where your main enemy is the trolls. You can build homes for your army or Villages to help you chop trees or mine for gold or stone. Travel around the world in the ship and go Flying to reach the isle quests or attack others and pick your defensive strategy. But Beware, defend your empire against attacks from trolls and other players

name: Red Wings: American Aces
description: Red Wings: American Aces is a thrilling warplane arcade shooter with online and local multiplayer modes. Whiz and swish through vibrant comic book-style skies solo or with friends and win the day!

name: Xenocider
description: Blast through corrupted worlds in this HD remaster of a cult classic! Xenocider is a third-person rail shooter inspired by arcade classics and presented in nostalgic 32-bit style!

name: Rocket Jump
description: Rocket Jump is a great platform game that requires concentration and composure. Our goal is to get as high as possible, avoiding spikes and various obstacles. Think carefully about your next move, any mistake can cost you a lot of nerves and time.. The higher you are, the further you can fall.

name: Here Comes the Hero
description: 1 on 1 action roguelike game where you fight through a randomly generated path filled with villains and events until you defeat the final boss.

name: Fallen City Brawl
description: Brawl through the city in hard-hitting pixel art style inspired by arcade classics! Inspired by arcade beat ’em ups of the late ’80s and early ’90s, Fallen City Brawl is a story of ambition and revenge told through intense side-scrolling pixel art action.

name: Drifting: Weight of Feathers
description: A third-person-action game with a special emphasis on aerial-combat. Players need to utilize grappling hook and acrobatics to fight enemies, solve puzzles to progress through each level.

name: Escape Ninja
description: apanese style maze FPS A simple action game where you aim for the goal while being chased by enemies! Use the map and hiding techniques to get to the goal!

name: Astlibra Revision
description: Astlibra Revision is a side scrolling 2D action RPG. It contains various reinforcement elements, exhilarating combat, rare equipment, battles with huge bosses, beautiful art, and long story. Estimated playtime: 40+ hours

name: Mr. Sleepy Man
description: In Mr. Sleepy Man, you play as a sleepy guy who's up way past his bedtime and out of control! Make a mess of everything you find and turn Bedtime Town against you! This sandbox adventure is filled with comical hijinks, outrageous characters, and platforming action!

name: Atelier Sophie 2: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Dream
description: The latest entry in the series follows the beloved alchemist, Sophie Neuenmuller, shortly after her adventures in 2016’s Atelier Sophie: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Book.

name: Blue Reflection: Second Light - Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
The Blue Reflection: Second Light Digital Deluxe Edition includes the following:

- Blue Reflection: Second Light base game
- Hoshinomiya Extreme Makeover Swimsuit – Costume Set
- Uniform Alt. Color – Costume Set
- Extreme School Makeover Kit
- Jump Start Fragment Set
- Special Photo Frame – Bulletin Board: Display your fondest memories on a bulletin board. The Photo Frame “Bulletin Board” is added.

name: Dynasty Warriors 9: Empires - 20th Anniversary Box
description:
The 20th Anniversary Box includes:
- The Game
- 94 Character Cards, stand included
- Original Soundtrack (2 CDs)
- Special 20th anniversary selection artbook of the 94 characters

name: Atelier Sophie 2: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Dream - Premium Box
description:
The latest entry in the series follows the beloved alchemist, Sophie Neuenmuller, shortly after her adventures in 2016’s Atelier Sophie: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Book.

The Premium Box comes with:
Game: Atelier Sophie 2: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Dream Game
- Atelier Sophie 2 Art Book
- Atelier Sophie 2 Extra BGM
- Original Art B3 Fabric Poster
- “My New Look” Costume Download Code

name: Atelier Sophie 2: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Dream - Special Collection Box
description:
The latest entry in the series follows the beloved alchemist, Sophie Neuenmuller, shortly after her adventures in 2016’s Atelier Sophie: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Book.

The Limited edition comes with:
Game: Atelier Sophie 2: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Dream Game
- Atelier Sophie 2 Art Book
- Atelier Sophie 2 Extra BGM
- Original Art B3 Fabric Poster
- “My New Look” Costume Download Code
- Atelier Sophie 2 Two Special Folders
- Sophie's Whale Necklace Keychain
- Special Crystal Paperweight
- A1 Tapestry

name: Atelier Sophie 2: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Dream - Limited Edition
description:
The latest entry in the series follows the beloved alchemist, Sophie Neuenmuller, shortly after her adventures in 2016’s Atelier Sophie: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Book.

The Limited edition comes with:
- Game: Atelier Sophie 2: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Dream Game
- Japanese Import Atelier Sophie 2 Art Book
- Japanese Import Atelier Sophie 2 Extra BGM
- Japanese Import Original Art B3 Fabric Poster
- Japanese Import Sophie's Whale Necklace Keychain
- North American Pre-Release “My New Look” Costume Download Code
- North American Collector's box

name: Touken Ranbu Warriors: Special Collection Box
description:
Touken Ranbu Warriors (called Touken Ranbu Musou in Japan) is an action console game for Nintendo Switch and PC via DMM Game Player announced on August 11th, 2021.

The Special Collection box comes with:
- The Game
- Special Drama CD
- Design Art Book
- Switch pouch

name: Final Fantasy XI: Adventure
description: The popular MMO Final Fantasy XI, now for the Game Boy! Featuring 30+ areas and 20+ songs rendered in an authentic gameboy fashion!

name: Displacer Beast
description:
There's something wrong with your new cat.

A ghost story about small creatures and the harm we do to each other.

Warning: This game contains written descriptions of gore, animal death, emotional abuse, and fleshy abominations.

name: A Duck Has An Adventure
description: A Duck Has An Adventure is an unique hypercomic adventure game that challenges you to discover all the different possible lives one duck could live. From adventures on the high seas to the halls of academia and beyond, every choice you make builds a new pathway along which to explore.

name: LEGO Mario 64
description: Lego Mario 64 is a ROMhack/mod of Super Mario 64, made to replicate the LEGO set based on the Nintendo 64 game. It has a small low poly Mario jumping on miniature versions of some Nintendo 64 stages, in search for five hidden Power Stars.

name: D_Cide Traumerei
description: A turn-based action/battle game for your smartphone.

name: Ragnador
description: Ragnador is a Youkai-themed RPG for your smartphone.

name: Legeclo: Legend Clover
description: Legeclo: Legend Clover is a SRPG in which players summon the bishoujo heroes such as Jeanne d’Arc, Arthur, Siegfried and more, to confront monsters known as Abyss. The game features a diverse training system and tactical battle system. Players can also develop bondings with the heroes and enjoy their individual stories.

name: Wind Boys!
description: Wind Boys! is a smartphone and PC browser game under the theme of brass band x high school boys x youth announced in October 2018. Illustrator Natsuko is credited as the character designer, and Hideki Sakamoto, who worked on Bungo to Alchemist, is in charge of music.

name: Vampires Dawn: Deceit of Heretics
description: Vampires Dawn: Deceit of Heretics is a mobile game and a part of the popular German Vampires Dawn series. Unlike the PC games, this game models its combat after Tactical RPGs.

name: I am Magicami
description: Action-RPG for your smartphone, released in Japan.

name: Piratopia
description: Set sail in the open seas! Plunder in PvE and PvP, trade goods for ship upgrades or equipments to hunt the Kraken, all in the same Server. Dominate by yourself or with maties.

name: Bouncy Bullets 2
description: Get ready for more vibrant, colorful shooting fun in the anticipated sequel to Bouncy Bullets! Can you find the portal to exit each level?

name: Top Boat: Racing Simulator 3D
description: Top Boat combines extreme mind-blowing visuals and sound with breathtaking gameplay. Experience top-notch graphics with realistic world settings and amazingly detailed ocean-going rides on powerboats and motorboats. Pick and tune to perfection one of the 25+ powerboats from 6 unique boat classes: hovercraft, classic, offshore, catamaran, jetski, and hydroplane. Customize your boat by tuning its appearance and slap on some decals if you want to! Are you fed up with standard boat racing games? Then you should definitely take a look at this one! Top Boat is setting a new standard in the boat racing genre. Jump on a jetski and experience the most amazing water action out there!

name: Balloon Pop
description: The children can adjust the size of the balloons and the airspeed. This makes the game suitable for children of all ages. The game contains instructive language outputs in 14 different languages and children learn the numbers from 1 to 20, the complete ABC, the most important geometric shapes and the most important colors.

name: Beach Volleyball Challenge
description: Feel the heat of sunshine, suit up in a light outfit, and start the emotional battle in Beach Volleyball Challenge. It’s the best simulator of beach volleyball available on the market! Get a virtual trip to places like Copacabana or Manhattan Beach – the capitals of that summer sport! This sport game will serve you emotions comparable to that given on tournaments like Manhattan Beach Open, New York Open, or Huntington Beach Open!

name: What the Zombies?!
description: What the Zombies?! is a game about... zombies! Game features 2 game modes!

name: Sealed Bite
description: Embark on a metroidvania-style platforming adventure in pursuit of power, memories and truth! Explore the beautiful pixel-art world, from autumn forests to frigid mountain tops and more! Hone your abilities as your memories come back, one by one - or make the spirits recognize you don't need "medicine" to persevere!

name: Top Down Racer
description: Top Down Racer is the classic racing game at its best realization. Drive on different tracks in a race of six cars that will ask you dexterity and skills. Be cautious with your car to not risk car crash, collect repair power ups and speed boosts. Overtake your competitors and be first on the finish line!

name: Starlight Alliance
description: Starlight Alliance is an action RPG, featuring two playable characters – Cyris and Lea. If you like fast third-person shooter gameplay with plenty of character development, exploration, and puzzle-solving, Starlight Alliance is the game for you! Likewise, if you’re into shooting annoying drones that tell you to get back to work, we got you covered. Starlight Alliance has it all.

name: Stickman: Far East Battle
description: Stickman: Far East Battle is an exciting arcade game where you have to help the stickman eliminate all the enemies on the screen. Every new level comes with its fair share of challenges, and you must do everything you can in order to win. New challenges appear all the time, and with the right strategy you can make it work. This is exciting and rewarding, fun and appealing. You can also fully customize your stickman with its own shield, hat, weapon and armor. That allows you to really show off your true power, and you even have multiple difficulty levels to try out. Protect the stickman in his far east adventure today! Features: Action packed gameplay Customize your stickman the way you want Intense, fun campaign Aesthetic graphics

name: Kirakira Stars Idol Project Memories
description: The three titles of the "Kirakira stars" series can be enjoyed in this one package. Nobuyuki Kinoshita, a fledgling idol producer, and his childhood friend Ai Amane, Nagisa Yukishiro, a top idol, and Reika Aiba, a senior idol. This is the story of the growth of producers and idols in ODA Production, a weak entertainment company!

name: Cube Samurai: Run Squared
description: The Cube Samurai is back in an all new endless runner! Eliminate the Conetrooper threat once and for all. Run, Jump, Slash and Slam your way across distant planets to become the hero our universe needs. A great game for kids, but don't worry, the whole family can get in on the action with this fun running game.

name: Colsword
description: Logic puzzle game in which you have to paint the cubes in the desired sequence using your colored magic swords.

name: Shadow Corridor
description: Chased by the spirits of the cursed Noh mask, you must do everything you can to escape. Set in traditional Japanese locales, Shadow Corridor provides a unique survival horror experience. Randomly generated maps filled with a variety of items make every playthrough different. Immerse yourself in the darkness, for only the determined will survive.

name: Road Racing: Highway Car Chase
description: Jump behind the wheel and race through the endless busy roads and highways! Make near traffic misses discovering unique locations. Roads and highways are full of speeding motorcycles and cars – they can bother you. Be also prepared to escape from the cops, who might even use a helicopter to catch you. Brace yourself for an action-packed run, filled with skin-of-the-teeth near misses. Nobody said that it's easy to win!

name: Simple Dominoes
description: Simple Dominoes offers you the opportunity to play dominoes and have fun for a change. We created Simple Dominoes with a single premise, to help show off your prowess while pushing the boundaries and the gameplay to the next level. It really is one of the most exciting and rewarding ways to play dominoes. We follow the standard game rules, and it’s an experience suitable for newcomers and experts alike. If you love dominoes, you always want to test your prowess either against a great AI. Here you get to have that, and it’s a really fun experience to try out! Features: 4 game modes 300 levels in puzzle mode Simple, fun dominoes gameplay Test your prowess and see if you can win

name: Lord of the Click II
description: Yes! Oh my gosh! Hell yeah! This long-promised day has finally come with the release of the game that kills not only your time but your calories as well! The return of the legendary Lord of the Click has happened so suddenly and with a number «II» on the end.

name: Monster Truck Arena
description: Use ramps as an excuse for amazing jumps, drive your Monster Truck across cars that look like toys compared to you, do loop-the-loops... Most importantly, do all of it with style. The game's controls are designed in a way that makes pulling off mind-blowing tricks easy and effortless. 50 different missions will not only test your driving skills, but allow you to show off your inventiveness and imagination.

name: Mandalas
description: Let your creativity flow in Mandalas and color beautiful manadals. Choose from different color palets and just relax, draw and create beautiful artwork. Share it with your friends and have a good time in Manadals!

name: DroneRidge
description: Welcome to DroneRidge, the ultimate skill game! Navigate your drone through 20 atmospheric levels, featuring cool retro graphics and a truly unique urban soundscape. Skilfully avoid obstacles to reach the landing zone... if you can! Levels range from easy to very hard, and can be played, or re-played in any order... so you can keep improving your skills and scores!

name: Pool Puzzles
description: Pool Puzzles puts you into the ultimate pool battle. Do you have what it takes to fulfill every level’s requirement? Each game is very intense and fun, and you get to test as well as improve your pool experience every time. That’s what really makes it stand out above the rest, so you have to give it a try right away. With Pool Puzzles, every level is exciting since you have to fulfill new challenges. You can buy a variety of skins with the coins you acquire from your gameplay. So there’s always a need to improve your skills and become even better than before. Check out the ultimate pool game with some great challenges!

name: Halloween Snowball Bubble
description: While you play, create mythical characters by matching the bubbles that are the same colour. You can make ‘Combos’ or get various special ‘PowerUps’, such as the guided rocket, the destructive bomb and the laser blaster, all with the aim of reaching the top of the scoreboard. Beautiful and nostalgic graphics set in a charming toy store from long ago, which will take you back to your most retro childhood. Relaxing and immersive game where you'll be trapped until you discover which unusual character is hiding behind each snowball.

name: Medieval Tower Defense
description:
Imagine a world of knights where you must defend the resources of the inhabitants under your protection from the invasion of barbarian hordes. To do this, you will have to manage your budget by acquiring and using the best weapons of the time, catapults and cannons.

Medieval Tower Defense, with its exceptional graphics, will bring you hours of strategic fun....

name: Mini Car Racing 2
description: Race around in tiny vehicles in a giant household and experience amazing races with your friends up to four players or race alone and hunt the next best race time in 16 different race tracks! Complete championships to unlock new different tracks or race the arcade mode. Play with up to four friends in splitscreen and have a fun race ecperience! Race On!

name: Miners Races
description: In Miners Races, you need to show that you are the ultimate miner as you try to acquire the highest score and as many diamonds as you can. This is not going to be easy, since you are against the clock and you need to do this as fast as possible. It’s a very engaging and fast, action-packed game where you really have to test yourself and your limits. Every new mission is different, so you never really know where to go and how to achieve those goal. It adds to the difficulty of the game, while always encouraging you to have fun and experiment. Show that you’re the better miner in Miners Races today! Features: Exciting mining race Get the highest score Accumulate the most diamonds Intense, fun mining gameplay

name: Doka-fli
description: Game that takes place in the credits of the Game Gear Micro White, made for the Sega Master System/Sega Mark III by M2. It is a simple game where you destroy the credits of the staff that worked on the game and the GG Micro White/Aleste collection by bouncing a spaceship among them. Released on December 24, 2020 inside the Game Gear Micro White, and in extremely limited quantities for the Sega Master System.

name: Guardians of Greenheart
description: After ten thousand years of waiting, the Demon Lord Alrolloth and his bloodthirsty Orc warriors have returned to Greenheart. With a force of mighty Orc warriors and help from the Demons of Hell, the fall of the Great Forest Greenheart is only a matter of time.

name: Love Flute
description: Play the piano, play the flute, and enjoy a ghost story as you use the profits from your street performances to buy new instruments and furniture! Let's shoot for fame and fortune!

name: Game Theory At Christmas
description: In order to participate in the game competition, let's make a game with the theme of Game Theory. Originally thought so, but due to various complicated reasons. In the end it became a spoof game.

name: Escape From Planet Aelea
description: In this action-adventure game from DASA Studios, play as lone astronaut Jennifer Sousa as she evades deadly robots, solves puzzles to collects access keys, and uncover the secrets of outpost 3 to escape planet Aelea!

name: Gorge
description: Gorge is a first-person puzzle-platformer, where you use telekinesis and wall-running to solve challenging interconnected obstacle courses.

name: Scale Enchanter
description: Scale Enchanter is a musical scales building game. Test your scale building skills in this simple and minimalist puzzle game.

name: Língua
description: Follow Beto's adventure through the northeast of Brazil in this top-down adventure! Solve puzzles, battle to free animal spirits and finish quests to help a friend retrieve a valuable possession!

name: The Twins' Experiment
description: The Twins' Experiment is a platform adventure game. You play as Object 62473 who is called to discover his hidden brother in a dream world of his mind.

name: Mystery Swords
description: Mystery Swords is a survival game with RPG elements. Your village was attacked by evil orcs. To protect the inhabitants, you, as the best soldier, are sent to explore the forest, but the enemies were much closer than it seemed. Can you stop a whole horde of hostile orcs?

name: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive - Operation Riptide
description: Dive into Operation Riptide! New challenges await, with new maps, new game mode options, and the all-new Private Queues!

name: Super Grave Snatchers
description: Use pixelated necromancy to smash villages, scare townsfolk, and generally cause a ruckus.

name: Cologne 3D
description: Explore parts of Cologne like the historic Old Market in the old town and the Gottfried-Hagen-Street in Cologne-Kalk (the office of the developer!).

name: Angels Cove
description: You are called to a secluded house on a remote island to conduct a paranormal investigation. However, you find the island and the house abandoned. Or are they?

name: Weakpoint Delta
description: Asteroids go boom. Zoom around in your lil' ship and learn how to accurately hit weakpoints on asteroids to extract the precious crystals within allowing you to purchase upgrades.

name: Hyper Bullet
description: Hyper Bullet is a top-down action game replenished with agreeable vaporwave aesthetics, pure joy of combat and gunplay rhythm.

name: Farmers' Market
description: Farmers’ Market is a strategy game which requires the farmer to harvest crops and sell them at the local market in a set amount of time. After each harvest, money is gained and improvements can be made on the farm to increase production.

name: Yoli
description: A satisfying shooting game with 4 gameplay modes and simple controls! Upgrade your character and defend the Portal from the creatures of the void.

name: My name is Velcro
description: My name is Velcro is a hardcore platformer. You play as a piece of dirt named Velcro. The goal of the game is to grab the ceiling with the web and move on. There are several types of traps. You are also forbidden to touch any edges.

name: Deep Despair 2
description: Deep Despair 2 is an open world survival adventure action game with procedural generation and complete freedom of action: building, crafting, hunting, farming, livestock, brewing, cooking, traveling, fight, and more.

name: Evolution Tag 2
description: A unique twist on the MOBA genre, incorporating elements of RTS, survival, and cat and mouse style gameplay. Evolve, survive, build bases, control armies, and fight other players in an intense 10vs5 match between humans and the undead.

name: Victor
description: A third person gladiator fighting game, in which you defeat waves of enemies to claim victory

name: Pale Roots
description: Work. Earn money. Pay for survival. Speak with crazy characters as tragedy unfolds. You have sixteen weeks before the town ends.

name: Doom Work
description: In this atypical game, your role is to prevent the working robots from finishing construction to save the forest!

name: Stella Pastoris
description: Shepherd the last remnants of the Malthusian monks marooned on Proxima Centauri B. As the colony AI, will you delve into forbidden means to save your people or allow them to go quietly into the night? Set up production chains to spend limited resources to save as many as you can.

name: Bat Boy
description:
A Sentai sports hero 8-bit action adventure!

Bat Boy and his fellow sports-star friends secretly battle against the evil invading forces of Lord Vicious, hell-bent on hosting sinister athletic events for his own amusement!

name: Do I Feel?
description: You are a trapped nameless hero in a grim world that has been distorted by corrupted feelings. Fight back! Dive into a 2D hand-drawn story-rich platformer, mixing exploration and action. In this short journey, you need to pass through the darkest side of this strange world and ask: do I feel?

name: Knights of Grumthorr 2
description: Real-time strategy and tactics in a fantasy world of knights and magic! Command heroes, soldiers and mages to battle against the armies of darkness. Grumthorr needs you!

name: Plan B from Outer Space: A Bavarian Odyssey
description: Escape the grasp of the Barbvarians! Plan B from Outer Space is a stellar adventure in the style of an interactive book and takes inspiration from classic science-fiction stories and Bavarian culture. Every decision will affect the outcome of your mission; to leave this strange planet unscathed!

name: Paper Bum
description: A feral dog tries to survive in a hostile world. The dog doesn’t trust anyone and maybe there is a reason for that. There are two ways: to become a wolf or to give people a chance. Paper Bum is a dark adventure resembling a sad child’s drawings.

name: Baking Bustle: Ashley's Dream
description: Baking Bustle: Ashley's Dream immerses you in an incredible culinary world! Recipes have no boundaries in this delicious game. Experience different cuisines and create your signature dishes! Expand your chain of eateries and build an empire.

name: Memory Lost
description: MemoryLost is an action shooter, the battles in which are built around the mechanics of mind capturing and moving into the enemy's body. First-aid kits were not delivered, there is only one clip in the weapon - change the bodies to survive!

name: Haunted Shores
description: Haunted Shores is a Single-player horror game where you are an investigative journalist of the paranormal, travelling to different locations confirming or debunking the tales of each. No guns, knifes or axes... just you against myth.

name: Save Yourself!
description: A burning skyscraper, a sinking ship, or a meteor shower – use your wits and everything that comes in handy, in order to save yourself from extremely perilous catastrophes. Save yourself!

name: Hidden Object Hunt Classic
description: Are you ready to test your eyes with Hidden Object Hunt Classic, your seek and find skills will be challenged like never before. Develops your secret seeker skill to find objects. This is a puzzle game similar to Hidden Object games, in which you have to find the objects while the clock is ticking.

name: Catsploration
description: An adventure, a difficult 3d platformer, and an exploration of imaged scenes. Cat.

name: Mannaz
description: Simultaneous resolution turn-based PvP combat game about battles between wizard schools. New combat mechanics, spell fusion, infinite customization and team management options, making each combat totally different from the previous one.

name: Supraland: Six Inches Under
description: Supraland Six Inches Under has exploration, puzzles, and combat! A first-person-metroidvania taking place six inches under Supraland.

name: Remy Raccoon and the Lost Temple
description: A cute, Raccoon-based, dungeon-crawling, gem-grabbing arcade game. Join Remy Raccoon on a perilous journey through over 100 levels filled with fiendish traps and malevolent creatures. Only the bravest adventurer will collect all the gems and progress to the next level. Your adventure awaits...

name: The Upturned
description: A frantic adventure. Welcome to the Upturned Inn: a grand hotel for the dead! You just want to find your room.

name: Robotry!
description: Wreak havoc in a physics-based world! Walk, jump, kick, grab and throw by directly controlling each leg. Go from a glitching toddler to a somersaulting acrobat in the story mode, or tackle your friends in multiplayer versus modes.

name: Grandma's Footsteps
description: A game for humans who enjoy suffering, injustice and cookies.

name: Three in a Rogue
description: Three in a Rogue is a tactical turn-based three in a row roguelike. Cascade combos to fight monsters and explore a randomly generated dungeon.

name: Fei
description: 《蜚》以一个名叫幸运的男孩视角，讲述了在一个被黑恶保护伞笼罩下的架空城市中发生的一系列边缘事件，涉及很多方面的问题……

name: The Chicken's Fall
description: Once Upon a time, A chicken that dreamed of flying, she tried 30 times... and fell. Fall, dodge obstacles and don't die.

name: Stories of Blossom
description: Reawaken your inner child and explore the colourful worlds of Stories of Blossom. A series of wholesome adventures, brought to life by the imagination of a young girl.

name: Memory Booster
description: Memory Booster – is a incremental puzzle game. Memorize tiles, upgrade stats to progress easier and train your brain!

name: Project Create
description: Gain experience and level up in this voxel sandbox world as you travel through space and time. Craft equipment and recipes to help you survive the treacherous landscape and sculpt it into your own masterpiece!

name: Storage Chase
description: Help the furry creature stay alive and overcome all obstacles in this challenging and dynamic 2D platformer - Storage Chase!

name: Mech Mind Ninja
description: Here, your choices have consequences. Embark in a Time Travel Ninja Tale with multiple routes. Isao is a member of a Brotherhood from the Meiji Era in Japan who travels between the XXII and XIX centuries. What would be your choices on this journey? Make your choices and discover the consequences.

name: Niki in the Ship
description: A first-person exploration game set on a planet where a god keeps you in prison. As Niki, you will travel around the planet with your ship, visiting beautiful places and trying to find a way to face the god itself.

name: 25 Layers of Pain
description: Are you tired of being happy? Does life keep giving you everything you want? Are you finally ready to turn that frown right-side-up? Play 25 Layers of Pain. The game for masochists.

name: Aqua Boy
description: Aqua Boy is a deep sea treasure hunter, but his latest mission has gone drastically wrong! Explore a quirky underwater world packed with secrets in this mini metroidvania.

name: The Eightfold Path
description: The path of a Buddhist monk is a path of enlighenment. Find your way through the mystical forest and encounter beautiful creatures, magical places, evil spirits and puzzling challenges which you will have to complete in order to be released from suffering.

name: Beyond the Darkness
description: Beyond The Darkness is a horror adventure game with puzzles where you help little girl Milly battle nightmares in the darkness to find her missing family. You will find yourself in bizarre worlds of memories, distorted by fears, and your only weapon will be the light of a small lamp...

name: Not Another Dungeon?!
description: The demonic Tower of Imalsrith has appeared on the battlefield of the Kingdom of Infantriell and the Empire of Fractile. Conquer it in this action-packed card game with rogue-lite elements!

name: Maison Rouge
description: This is a story about an ordinary person living during the economic crisis in France. The country is on the verge of revolution. The main character will have to choose which side to take. Lead a rebellion or defend the honor of a king.

name: Sandfall
description: The Sand War, a destructive conflict that took place over 30 years ago, still inflicts collateral damages on the continent. Our heroes must discover the the truth behind the war and bring peace once more to the continent while dealing with their own inner conflicts.

name: Evil Mansion
description: Evil Mansion is a first-person 3D Werewolf game with real-time voice chat. The game has a variety of occupations (such as security, doctors, detectives).and the vote system is not for vote out player, but for mark the position of the player with the most votes.

name: Hamster Playground
description: Prepare for cuteness overload, relentless training, and fierce rivalry as you and your hamsters take on challenges while traversing the maze and riding a skateboard! Be the first ones to cross the finish line to earn rewards and yummy treats!

name: Doomsday Defense
description: The end of the world is coming, face the endless attacking zombies, please live to the end...

name: 666 Masks
description: How to survive despair and fear? Stir up your emotions. Look at the world in a new way. Get out of the maze of the catacombs by completing interesting quests. Collect all Masks and become alive again...

name: PaintballX
description: PaintballX is an online mutliplayer FPS paintball game! Battle your friends in a casual paintball FPS!

name: Fox Goes Hunting
description: A combination Shooter and Action-Adventure game where the player is the hungry fox that needs to hunt food (Chickens, Rabbits, etc.). There are large predators (Bears, Wolves, etc.) that the fox must shoot using bullets that are earned as rewards.

name: Lawnmower Game: Battle
description: New part for Epic lawnmower game series. Now collect different weapons and destroy evil enemy ai lawnmowers in different arenas

name: Last Minute
description: You find yourself in a difficult situation, tired of all the city-life and decided that it’s for the best if you move into a camp in the woods with the friend you love the most – Ozzy. What adventures await you?

name: Romans: Age of Caesar
description: Build Rome Together! A co-operative grand strategy MMO from a team of veteran city builders, Romans: Age of Caesar is the latest historical strategy game from Firefly Studios.

name: Leshy
description: Leshy is a hack'n'slash game based in the near future, in which the player takes the role of a forest guardian from the Slavic mythology. Fight ruthless humans that invade your home - the primeval forest. Face the enemy's world fueled by modern technology and evil motivations.

name: VR Great Rome City
description: This is a VR leisure travel game for visiting ancient Rome. Players can visit the ancient Roman arena and other scenes.

name: Detective AI
description: Become a detective and confront an assassin controlled by an artificial intelligence that evolves with each case you investigate.

name: Undarkened: Revival
description: Undarkened is a wizarding survival-adventure game where you must unravel the mystery of what, or who, corrupted your homeland. Explore a devastated world alone or with your friends, find out what happened, and try everything you can to save your home.

name: Treffen
description: Treffen is a game about boxing. Become the master of the sport of boxing, destroy your opponents, take revenge on your main enemy and take back your girlfriend.

name: The Last Will
description: "The Last Will" is a 3D point-and-click adventure game played from the perspective of a grieving father whose son just passed away.

name: Uniborne
description: You play as a unicorn assassin. You must execute your mission through your skills of stealth and violence. Being as quick as you can to reach your exit location to be extracted via magical rainbow tractor beams.

name: Fighties 2
description: Fighties 2 is a fast paced 2D platform fighter. It is the second Fighties game.

name: Cards Matching Memory Game
description: Do you like memory games? Looking for a fun way for brain training and a way to improve your memory? Check out Cards Matching Memory Game.

name: The Facility Project
description: An epic horror adventure crafted with a strong focus on atmosphere and story. Explore the environments of an abandoned facility, solving its mystery. Action taking place in the year 2006, play as a private investigator tasked to obtain information about the strange activities that were rumored.

name: Sinless Night
description: A small horror story in the style of old video films, telling about the terrible events that the main character of the game faced, who got a part-time job in a diner.

name: Legendary Tales: Stolen Life
description: “Legendary Tales: Stolen Life” is an adventure game in the genre of Hidden Objects, with plenty of mini-games and puzzles, unforgettable characters and complicated quests.

name: Join Rush Attack
description: Run the crowd until you reach the castle at the end of the level. Crush your rivals in the final battle and capture the fortress!

name: Night Cascades
description: The city is on fire, and the Devil is to blame - or is it? Two women must solve an occult-themed mystery set in an alternate 1980s while unraveling the secrets of their past. Hunt for clues and interrogate suspects in this interactive yuri visual novel.

name: Jet Set Corps
description: You are a Jet Pack Marine of the famous Jet Set Corps. Rescue Colonists and Save Colonies and Earth from Aliens Attack! Get ready, mission starts NOW! Jet Set Corps is a tribute to the best times in arcade games history.

name: Diptych
description: The heroes meet on the battlefield of the First World War, in the case of the "Diptych", an anthropomorphic animal, we learn a terrible and touching story in a deceptively cute and unique style.

name: Book of Adventum
description: An action-adventure FPS which combines the time-honored problem solving of adventure FPS games - shooting people in the face and getting through not-so-difficult puzzles - with metaphysical ponderings. You can craft and mod stuff as well.

name: Solo Royale
description: Solo Royale is an offline, single-player battle royale game. It is a fast-paced battle royale, getting the player immediately into the action. Solo Royale also has a gulag game mode, where the player faces off in a single-elimination 1v1.

name: Spidded
description: Spidded - An arcade platformer in which the player acts as a spider that moves with its web, dodging a fly swatter and balancing on an unstable web.

name: Without Pain
description: Without Pain - is a dynamic 2D shooter with surviving elements where you will have to fight against various types of monsters.

name: Detective Gman
description: Detective simulation. Top down open world exploration.

name: Human Madness
description: Human Madness is a multiplayer survivor game , you can customize your character and the weapons

name: The VanMan
description: this game is made by one person and will be uppdated irregulary

name: Mythic: Forest Warden
description: An action game where you play as a forest`s pagan god in the WW II times. Use god`s magic, brute force, sharp claws, and Nazi`s weapons to drive Germans away from your land.

name: Stoneheart
description: Adventure awaits in this RPG, with action, survival, crafting and base-building! Arriving in new lands, far from known civilization and with only a mysterious pendant, you will determine your own path. Will you survive the epic quest for the Stoneheart?

name: Old Coin Pusher Friends
description: This is an online cooperative coin pusher game set in the Old japan that can be enjoyed by one or all. Cooperate with other players and aim for the jackpot. In addition, by collecting prizes, new content is released and coins are easily increased. Online multiplayer for up to five players possible.

name: Squared Up
description: Join Cubert, a 3rd dimensional shape, on his quest to escape the 2nd dimension. Navigate puzzles by morphing Cubert's form and interacting with the world to escape back to the 3rd dimension.

name: 10th Corpse
description: 10th Corpse is a Match 3 game with plenty of fun twists. Enjoy 100 twisted Match3 levels and solve a murder in Mansion Vinterfragen!

name: Demolition Game
description: This is a simple game

name: Esports History
description: Esports adventure-tycoon with RPG elements where you will have to go through the path from an ordinary teenager to an esports star. Win tournaments, improve your character, use your time and resource wisely to prove that you are the best.

name: Wyvia
description: Wyvia is an open world 3D action RPG with 8-bit sprites inspired by classic JRPGs of the era. Featuring a class system with over 10 classes to choose from, a robust cross-class skill system, tons of weapon types, many dungeons to explore, and bosses to fight! Also you can ride a Wyvern!

name: Unknown Path
description: Rogue-like shooter about trains in the steampunk atmosphere of the future.

name: Inward
description: Discover, grow and name your own species of trees. Watch as the seed transforms from a sapling to a majestic tree. Water the tree with your mindfulness, habits and insights. Grow and discover yourself with the help of a stray dog called Samsara.

name: The Last Cadet
description: The Last Cadet is a deep sea action-driven metroidvania with elements of dread and isolation. Play one of two single player campaigns using twin-stick controls to escape a submarine sunk by an ancient monster. Also featuring two local co-op multiplayer modes at launch.

name: Spinner Invaders
description: Shoot your way through a thrilling action adventure of 120 waves in 4 different game modes while fighting against waves of enemies and 12 extreme bosses. Save the world from The General by yourself or with a friend locally and play 10 different Challenges.

name: The Steps of Divynia
description: Fight tainted beasts and uncover magic as Eustera transforms from the mundane to the unknown. Carve out your destiny as Aldyia in a tale about courage and holding to your beliefs. Is the past worth not knowing, or does it deserve to be remembered? Find out in this storybook 2D platforming adventure.

name: Infinity Treasures
description: Labirinth of Infinity Treasures is a game that can be challenging and funny with each level. Brave forests, swamps, and venture to the depths of the planet to discover forgotten treasures.

name: Warlocks Entanglement
description: Warlocks Entanglement puts you into a destructible open world in a magical medieval setting. Explore and learn all this world has to offer and then open a gateway to the next world!.

name: Alec Adventure
description: Alec Adventure is a casual 2D pixel platformer. Shoot your crossbow as you travel through different environments fighting many different enemies. Find your way back home with items you find and don't forget to enjoy the view on the way!

name: Flesh Water
description: This is your last day as a worker for a pet feeding service, and depending on how the day goes, your life. Prepare the final meal for a client's odd pet that lives in an abandoned pool all while trying to make it out safely and avoid mistakes.

name: Bainok: City of Fighters
description: Combat men and monsters in this turn-based martial art rpg, while you try to live day by day in the dystopian metropolis of Cirqualo.

name: Gehinnom
description: Gehinnom is a multiplayer horror game for 1-4 players. (Demo is single-player only). Collect clues and complete quests to perform a ritual and banish the demon that hunts you. Everything in Gehinnom is randomly generated, so you will always be scared.

name: Bridge of Dawn
description: Bridge of Dawn is a free, open-sourced 3D arcade/racing style game for one or two players. Follow the story of Vulpes the Fox as he rushes to catch the sun and find out the secret to everlasting life in this lighthearted and fun game for all ages.

name: Short Hop Laser
description: Take the short hop laser concept from SSBM, and make it a 2d side scroller arcade game. Actually don't do that, because I already did that.

name: Hidden Flowers
description: Find the flowers that are hidden on the map

name: I Love Finding Pups
description: I Love Finding Pups is a classic Hidden Object game. Explore stunning locations through hidden object scenes and minigames while collecting all the adorable pups!

name: Wednesday Basketball
description: Live a year in a small town basketball association. Follow the stories of Fanny, Alex, Remy, Ajiba, Laura, Odile, Benjamin, Amir, Kariem and Meng as the season passes by. Some will join, some will leave. Relax and play some basketball.

name: Starry Moon Island
description: This is an old school game collection with ten different types of mini-games. The story tells of a series of wars that took place on the island.

name: Pax Narcotica: Trafficker
description: Become a cartel boss and take over the US drug trade. Build smuggling networks across the country and negotiate sales with crime groups. Recruit soldiers to protect your shipments and expand your territory. Bribe police and politicians to protect your interests and disrupt your rivals.

name: Absurd Chess
description: Compete against up to 100 players in various, REALLY absurd chess modes never seen before! You will have to adapt to new rules and develop your own tactics that will allow you to dominate the board.

name: Jumping Pirates
description: Jumping Pirates are fun adventures where you have to get to the finish line alive but there are some problems with that ... Overcome obstacles, collect coins, avoid water and sharp objects! Complete all levels and defeat all enemies!

name: Box Survivors World
description: Box Survivors World is a multiplayer action survival game where players will have to do their best to become the greatest survivor.

name: HipWitch
description: HipWitch is a chill puzzle game that invites you to explore a beautiful nature reserve. Play as Prom, a young witch helping a cast of quirky characters. Use a variety of spells, and the power of 90s dial-up internet to solve the tasks ahead!

name: One Way to Exit 2
description: Move forward or backward in search of an exit, but remember: if you start moving, you will not be able to stop. Take bonuses, destroy obstacles and bosses, but in no case touch them or the walls, otherwise you will have to start from the beginning.

name: Pre Dusk
description: Discover the strange world of Pre Dusk with a child who knows nothing about his life and faces great difficulties in finding out the truth about his world.

name: Red Button
description: Get ready to take part in the world war! It depends only on your choice who you will be - a winner or a loser! It's time to press the red button!

name: Road Gangs Simulator
description: Become a gangsta in the Road Gangs Simulator. Dive into a mix of the strategy and the TPS genre. Control each member of the gang, assault other gangs or even rob a bank! Wanna be the bad guy? Wishlist now and own the city!

name: Potata: Foxy Tale
description: Potata: Foxy Tale is a fairy tale themed platformer adventure game in a beautiful world of dark forests. Your goal is to restore the balance and assemble the fragments of the Woodland Spirit.

name: Battal Gazi: Stone of Yada
description: The Stone of Yada which gives enormous power to its possessors has broken into four pieces. Kill every enemy in front of you, capture Yada Guards, and bring these pieces together one by one to obtain that power.

name: Rocket Sword
description: Rocket Sword is a ridiculous, gratuitous slash-'em-up where you are the projectile: a rocket-propelled greatsword. Slice, stab, and pulverize everyone in your path with the most powerful weapon in the universe.

name: Abettor
description: Abettor is a top-down shooter where enemies constantly spawn all around you. In this game, not only does the world generate around you, but the enemies do as well. Kill as many enemies and achieve your highest score. How many can you kill in Abettor?

name: Road Builder
description: Road Builder is a logic puzzle game based on the system of creating roads and managing traffic flow. The player's task is to connect selected entry and exit roads by creating complex structures of intersections and junctions so that traffic collides with each other as little as possible.

name: Lucent Bounds
description: Lucent Bounds is a short and challenging 3D platformer. Make your way through an alien ocean planet by jumping, dashing, slamming, gliding, and swinging about. Avoid hazards, collect treasures, and challenge yourself in speed runs.

name: Horror Maze
description: A Tense, Terrifying series of mazes.

name: Jurassic Snap
description: Congratulations photographer , you have been selected for the mission on Gliese 486B . In order to study the creatures similar to the dinosaurs that live there, you will take pictures of them and we will study their behavior. So we will see if humans are able to cohabit.

name: Halloween Puzzle
description: Halloween Puzzle is an educational game for children in which you have to collect a picture from puzzles. The game has 12 levels, a pleasant atmosphere for children.Good music, nice graphics, mouse control, the game develops memory well.

name: Killer Gin Bros
description: Harken back to the old school platformers! Heavily inspired by an Arcade Classic, use attacks, powers, and advanced tactics to eliminate enemies or your friends! Win by collecting 5 coins or being the last man standing! One thing is for sure, skills pay the bills!

name: Morbid Inhale
description: Hungry zombies want to devour you. Take the biggest gun and fight them back! Get experience, upgrade skills, use perks, bonuses, and kill them by any means. Shoot, blast, burn, rip and tear!

name: Hammerheart
description: Punishing, strategic and with a heavy focus on authenticity, Hammerheart is a hardcore roguelike set in the viking age that combines directional medieval combat with party customization and strategy mechanics.

name: Gra & Vity
description: Handle gravity to join Gra & Vity.

name: Blood Impact
description: Fight for your escape from this mysterious lab. Use your blood powers to achieve your goal in this action adventure game! But don’t forget, blood is vital...

name: Lack of Water
description: Lack of water is a puzzle game. You need to direct the flow of water towards an empty glass.

name: Neeron: The Blade of Nature
description: Utilize the power of the Neeron, fight ingeniously against the invasion. Set off on a journey to protect the homeland!

name: Dash Realm
description: Dash Realm is a 2D multiplayer top down action shoot. Ideal for those boring breaks between two games. Compete against your friends in the arena and claim victory!

name: Storms 2
description: Set in an ancient world, Storms 2 combines action, progression, and loot, with generated worlds to explore. Character and loot choices change up the game as you try to find your way home.

name: Mystery at Morgoth
description: Who is behind the evil events that unfurled in Feldar Vale? Journey to the land of Morgoth to halt the dark force that terrorizes the people and learn who is behind the mysterious Cabal. An adventure for 4-6 characters of Level 1-6, loosely based on Dungeons & Dragons Open Game License (OGL 1e/2e).

name: Wander Hero
description: This is the fantasy of a two-dimensional traverser in a different world. You can take a leisurely and strategically deep adventure. You can also collect beautiful girls without hurting your wallet, and form your own harem... ahem, mercenary group.

name: Revel
description: Revel is a fun and original suit-based card game that will test your skills and instincts. Stepping out of the shadows of blackjack and poker, Revel will give you unprecedented ways to play such as buying cards and dynamic card values. Will you pin down its elusive optimal strategy?

name: Goat's Tale
description: Get ready for an amazing, challenging goat adventure where only the best can get to the top.

name: Mortal Rite
description: Mortal Rite is a third-person, action RPG that aims to breathe new life into the rogue-lite and dungeon crawler genres. In Mortal Rite you must face the blood spirit's trials as you ascend the tower in order to gain our access into the guild. The game can be played in single player mode or up to 6 player co-op!

name: Typer Hero
description: Typer Hero is a typing game with two different difficulty modes, however survive mode will only appear once you have completed the game.

name: Survive the Story
description: Fight, explore, and survive. Find out what happened. And let the others know.

name: Empire Takeover
description: This is a fun & amazing tower crush game! Crush enemy's towers, take over the empire!

name: Witchfall: Secrets of Emotica
description: Welcome to the world of Witchfall, a magical land filled with adventure! Play as five adorable critters: Koemi, Rez, Maya, Sloberg or Envel as they embark on a perilous journey to stop the evil Professor Flitz from stealing the mysterious Emotica Shards.

name: Nextera
description: Near-future VTOL simulator

name: 1M84
description: An upcoming MMO RPG game with lots of fun and things to do! The things you can do are endless. With server updates planned every week!

name: Ultrawings 2
description: Welcome back to Ultrawings, Pilot! Take to the skies using your virtual hands (or HOTAS and gamepad) to fly 5 unique aircraft as you complete a diverse set of engaging, hand-crafted missions across an island-themed world in this made-for-VR, aerial-themed, action-adventure game!

name: Fragile Existence
description: Take command of the last surviving fleet of humankind in Fragile Existence, a sci-fi RTS with fully 3D planet surfaces and vast solar systems to explore. Dispatch expeditions to find resources, build settlements, construct vital parts and supplies, and evolve your technology to meet new threats.

name: Evolution: Moon Warfare
description: Low gravity sci-fi FPS team deathmatch game.

name: Gravity Mummy
description: "Gravity Mummy" is a platformer puzzle game. You play as a mummy guard who has different super powers to overcome the challenges: you can move heavy boxes, jump on the heads of bloodthirsty enemies, as well as move around the ceiling.

name: Evolution of War
description: The Evolution of War game shows the evolution of warfare in 5 ages, starting with the age of dinosaurs, crusades, medieval, 21st century (present time) and futuristic (fiction).The game's main objective is to destroy the enemy base.

name: Junkyard Fury
description: You appear in what seems to be an abandoned Junkyard, you don't quite know how you got there... But your not alone. Try to escape the Junkyard of killer cars, if you can.

name: Next Generation Soccer Coach
description: coming in WWC Qatar 2022

name: Story of Nararale
description: Story of Nararale is an RPG Strategy Turn-based game set in fantasy world that focus on managing party and fighting tactics.

name: Hidden Caves
description: Find the caves elements that are hidden on the map.

name: Ninja Express
description: ▲As a great ninja, after the combat mission is over, you need to protect your identity and collect necessary intelligence at the same time. For example, part-time as a courier. ▲You must quickly complete the client's entrustment, while avoiding the attention of the police.

name: Defect Process
description: Hack n' slash through increasingly dangerous arenas with a high action free-form combat system

name: The story of Bill Bear
description: Help the little bear to find the way home. What dangers can be hidden in the night streets of a quiet suburb? Who is waiting for him at home, and who is waiting in the dark around the corner?

name: Dungeon Arsenal
description: Dungeon Arsenal is a fast-paced roguelite card game. Select a hero to go through series of random-generated floors where you can search for weapons and items, while fighting enemies or running to the next floor to save your life. The game have lots of unlockables, such as new skins for the heroes, card borders, new weapons and relics.

name: Platypus Adventures
description: An action packed, third person adventure about a Platypus uncovering a cosmic mystery! Explore an epic story based on Australian animals and landscapes.

name: Ravenous Devils
description: An horror cooking simulator where you manage an evil family business. Improve your shops buying new tools and serve your customers.

name: Bunny Jewel Match Adventure
description: Bunny Jewel Match Adventure - The new match 3 game is here, with brilliant jewels in over 600 dazzling puzzles! A magical journey filled with waves of excitement and brilliant visuals! Swap jewels to clear the way, and match pieces to crush each challenge that lies ahead.

name: Commanding Nations
description: Commanding Nations brings back the fun gameplay of RTS. Build anywhere and produce as many units as you want, as long as you can collect the needed resources. Play with one of the 3 unique Nations and destroy your opponents.

name: Hearts of the Dungeon List
description: Conquer dungeons, find romance, upgrade the town, build your stats, or just take it easy in this fast-paced turn-based RPG.

name: Timewreck Tales
description: Fix the Timewreck in this story rich rogue-like RPG. Build up your team and collect time crystals as you battle, outwit, and discover different dimensions as Independent Time Specialists for Chronos Inc. Chronos Insurance does not cover brain warping or injuries from alternate versions of you.

name: League of Felt Tanks
description: "League of Felt Tanks" is a tank shooter game. We are developing for multiplayer, but now this single game for store review. We plan to create Battle with Friends mode and Team Battle mode, CO-OP mode! Please wait for update!

name: King's Helper
description: Have you ever wondered what the King's life is like? King's Helper is an extraordinary FPP game in which you have a chance to become his right hand. Travel back to the Middle Ages and assume the role of the King's helper.

name: Matching Cats
description: Match the cards of cute and funny kittens to find the correct path and pass level in this game that mixes memory and puzzle game!

name: Flyland Wars: 3 Model Trains
description: A sci-fi flying person vs. robot battle game. This flyland is a model train layout writ large! But it has been made to be terribly lethal You have to destroy every danger to the refugees! (Come back again, click the arrow button and play trains! Game within the game!)

name: Paradise Marsh
description: Wander through a perfect endless wetland! Catch tadpoles, enjoy peaceful sceneries and find lost poems while restoring fallen stars in the empty night sky.

name: Puzzle Art: Dogs
description: Minimalist, relaxing, picture logic, art - puzzle game with dogs.

name: Grand Attrition
description: Grand Attrition is a chaotic experimental strategy game where you can take control of everything in battles, from the existing terrain to enemy units. Survive attritions, detailed to the specifications of your choosing, and earn talent points to increase the chaos.

name: Last Defenders
description: The corruption must be purged! What do you get if you combine an cards, tanks & ... monastic order? LAST DEFENDERS.

name: Decide 4 God
description: Six of them wanted out. Six of them wanted in. Now, all twelve of them are trapped in a prison where a fate worse than death awaits them. Can they survive the wiles of Empathy Systems? What dark secrets lurk behind that institution? It is for the future when none may tread.

name: Space Reign
description: An indie space-sim and strategy game featuring ship and fleet combat mixed with management of a private space corporation. Claim sectors for your faction and raise its influence in the near-future, where resource exploiting corporations are in a state of constant conflict over territory control.

name: Primal Threat
description: Blast cyborg dinosaurs and other dangerous creatures in this side-scrolling action/adventure! Explore an ancient labyrinth full of upgrades, weapons, and secrets to save the planet from a primal threat!

name: Steinstern
description: Retro Space Action Shooter with RPG elements. Fight alone or together local couch coop! Prove your skills with many different weapons and several spaceships with different weapon layouts!

name: Mage Rumble
description: Battle by yourself or with friends against the computer and other players in this turn-based combat game! Learn new spells after each round (if you can afford them) to add to your arsenal. Choose your game mode, customize your preferences and may the best mage win!

name: Golf Together
description: Play Golf Together with your friends in this versatile mini golf game. Over the local area network, online or on your own. Choose from different modes and create your own levels with a extensive feature packed level editor.

name: Chronicles of Sarval: Bridges of Koni
description: After the appearance of a mysterious wizard, the bridges of Koni were bewitched. The king summons Sarval's wizards to help him. You are Helm, a wizard willing to solve the problem. Based on graph theory, the player needs to find the path that only passes through each bridge once.

name: Drinks Company Tycoon
description: Begin your own company story. Combine ingredients and categories to create your product. Vary the price and the taste. Build your image. Advance the technology. Adjust to market and customer needs, but dont forget about rivals. All of this and even more is waiting for you in Drinks Company Tycoon.

name: Iron Age
description: Iron Age is a First-person dungeon crawler set in a Sci-Fi Fantasy world with Realtime melee combat.

name: Superfluous Returnz
description: The adventures of Superfluous, a very useless superhero in a peaceful village in the deep French countryside ... Helped by his assistant Sophie, who tries to somehow temper the enthusiasm of his employer, he will try to apprehend the mysterious apple thief who is terrorizing the local orchards ...

name: Ship Simulator Realistic
description: Ship Simulator Realistic experience the real simulation. The game will be based on a free roam aspect to explore the Greece Scenery in a physics based game , realistic handling and many more features.

name: Catching a Ride
description: Drive at night seeing the road only through the light of other cars, in this tiny adventure about feeling lost, and making friends along the way.

name: A Visit to Friends
description: A Visit to Friends is a collection of four dioramas, each with their own themes, characters, and puzzles to solve. Catch chickens, put in a day's work, and explore your own subconscious through heterodox methods. All this and more is in store when you take A Visit to Friends.

name: Rhythm Brawl
description: Rhythm Brawl is a versus-rhythm game about taking part in band battles with a story mode based on rivalries between talented musicians. It is easy to learn but hard to master.

name: The Dawning
description: The Dawning is a first-person puzzle mystery game. Play as Detective Madison as he searches 7 beautifully crafted areas for clues to catch a killer. Use stealth to sneak past deadly enemies. Solve complex puzzles to access new areas, progress the rich storyline, and obtain key items.

name: Polar Explorer Simulator
description: Live a few days of an "ordinary" polar explorer and overcome all the difficulties. You can play alone or as a team. The more polar friends you have with you, the easier it is. But there can be a strictly limited number of polar explorers at one polar station.

name: Recapture the Castle
description: Recapture the Castle is a third-person shooter game. The invaders have occupied the castle. Now you need to take up arms to destroy the invaders.

name: Collapse of Magic
description: Collapse of Magic is a challenging grid-based tactical RPG focused on pure strategy and minimal RNG.

name: Gold Miner
description: The Gold Miner is a puzzle game. The goal of the game is to collect all nuggets and jewels in the level and avoid barrels with gunpowder.Collect gems, score points, upgrade your equipment! Try to complete all 20 levels as soon as possible, will you succeed ?!

name: Izanami
description: Izanami is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Gutting Goblins!
description: A top-down point and click dungeon-slaughterhouse where you slay goblins, break stuff and collect gold for score. explore a lived-in dungeon with heavy metal to keep you playing for anywhere between fifteen minutes to an hour at a time.

name: The Hero of Bangaona
description: The Hero of Bangaona is a 2D Side-scrolling Action game where you play as the Hero of Bangaona kingdom whose mission is to capture the enemy bases in order to rescue the Princess who got kidnapped by the soldiers of the Weins Territory.

name: Nuclear Drifter
description: Nuclear drifter is a 2D open-world post-apocalyptic game. In the game we play the role of a farmer who is looking for a new water source for his sheep.

name: Poly Puzzle: Furries 2
description: Cute, relaxing, polygonal puzzle game with furries.

name: Holiday Solitaire Easter
description: What has the Easter Bunny brought? Golden cards! Collect them all and complete 120 unique levels in the new Easter Solitaire!

name: Code Dread
description: Code Dread is a survival horror game for 1~4 players. You are on a mission to investigate an old abandoned hospital. Be prepared to fight against a ferocious monster lurking in the shadow!

name: Chill Corner
description: This is just an idle game for chillout and relaxing.

name: Dear Agony Aunt
description: Congratulations! You're on your way to becoming a professional agony aunt! All you have to do now is get through the trial period. Respond to messages using a retro 2006 email client. The replies you send will determine whether you are hired or fired at the end of the week. Good luck!

name: Zen Trails
description: Zen Trails is a relaxing, simple sand box in which you can do only one thing: draw lines. When you press play, the lines rotate to create beautiful designs. A zen-inducing spirograph-making experience to calm the soul while stimulating the mind.

name: 8 Links
description: 8 Links is a cool & smooth puzzle game where your goal is to link tiles. Make the longest chain, score more points and complete all the achievements

name: Tamale Loco: Rumble in the Desert
description: Sin descripción

name: Balloon De Fight'99
description: Sin descripción

name: Tatakae! KitadeMan
description: Sin descripción

name: Wonder World Walkers
description: Sin descripción

name: Phantom Blade: Executioners
description:
Phantom Blade: Executioners is a fast-paced action game set in the Phantom World.
It features a rich storyline of Kung-Fu adventures, where you dive into a conspiracy that threatens to topple the world, cut down Fung-Fu masters who have succumbed to insanity, and find out the mastermind following a series of seemingly independent incidents.

name: Emote Farming Simulator
description: Farm emotes, play scuffed games and react to video! See in-game simulated chatroom react to what you say and your gameplay. Say specific trigger words to make the in-game simulated chatroom react.

name: River City Saga: Three Kingdoms
description: In River City Saga: Three Kingdoms, the characters of the Kunio-kun series run-amok in the world of Sangokushi. The game, which follows the flow of the popular Downtown Special Kunio-kun's Historical Period Drama!, sees players cross countries and challenge the Romance of the Three Kingdoms.

name: F-Zero ZX Overdrive
description: F-Zero ZX Overdrive is a mod for F-Zero X which adds new machines, a new difficulty, level system, stats and a widescreen mode.

name: Super Smash Bros. Sonic 2 Mod
description: Super Smash Bros. Sonic 2 Mod is a mod for Super Smash Bros. (N64) which changes the stages of the games to new stages based on Sonic the Hedgehog 2.

name: Jet Force Gemini Trainer and Co-Op Hack
description: Jet Force Gemini Trainer and Co-Op Hack is a mod for Jet Force Gemini which adds cheats and support for co-op multiplayer for up to 4 players.

name: Zelda's Birthday
description: Zelda's Birthday is a mod for The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time - Master Quest. It features all new actor arrangements, all new text and story line, 3 totally redesigned dungeons, an optional side quest, endings (plural), and hidden goodies.

name: Castlevania: Aria of Sorrow Alter
description:
This is a hack of Aria of Sorrow that changes most part of the map, and the aim is to give completely new experience to players.

Changes

Most of the map redone. Some new puzzles added. Added a new area like Nest of Evil in PoR.
Some of the weapons, armors and accessories are changed. Example: Valmanway and Excarlibur.
Changed some items. Example: Mina’s Charm, work like magic ticket and can be used without consuming it. Talk to Mina to acquire this.
Most of souls are slightly easier to acquire.
Bug fixes to original game, including shop giltch and death warp.
Soma’s status are changed. Julius is greatly strengthened. The aim is that Julius is super and can be used very easily.

name: Vengeance is Mine
description: Vengeance Is Mine’s, brutal melee mech combat is augmented with a time-manipulation mechanic that adds a fascinating twist to encounters. Thanks to the capabilities of the HYDRA mech suit, the player will have the ability to speed up time and blink towards unsuspecting enemies, or rewind time to readjust combos or evade death. HYDRA also comes packing an energy-based projectile weapon that allows you to take on foes at distance.

name: Red Goes Faster
description: In Red Goes Faster, players take control of an aspiring young racer named Leon Garcia. Leon is a racer who takes part in intergalactic races by day and explores his home planet of Keplar at night. Players spend their time between races hanging out with Leon's friends in a variety of establishments while finding themselves trying to untangle a complicated love triangle.

name: Wanted: Dead
description: Wanted: Dead promises "spectacular melee combat and exciting gunplay," and is set in a "dark and dangerous version of science-fiction Hong Kong where you will need sharpened skills to survive."

name: F-Zero: GP Legend e+ Complete
description: F-Zero GP Legend e+ Complete is a mod which adds the e+ content of the game to the base game, without the need to have the e-Reader and all of the needed cards.

name: Mother 3: Claus's Journey
description: Mother 3: Claus’s Journey, is a hack that switches the roles of main characters Lucas and Claus, making Claus into the main protagonist, which greatly changes the story due to Claus’s drastically different personality compared to Lucas. Much of the text and story is altered to better showcase Claus’s personality and thoughts, as well as how others react to him.

name: Castlevania: Aria of Sorrow - Genya Arikado Hack
description:
This is a hack that replaces Soma Cruz with Genya Arikado from Aria of Sorrow. There are a number of other changes as well, such as elements from symphony of the night being carried over like the following:

The Alastor Soul has been replaced with the fully leveled Sword Familiar
The Imp Soul has been replaced with the Devil Familiar
The Flying Armor Soul has been replaced with the Faerie Familiar
The Devil Soul has been replaced with the stone Gargoyle/Demon Alucard form from SOTN
The Final Guard Soul has been replaced with the Alucard Shield
And

The Balmung sword has been replaced with a weaponized version of the Sword Familiar fully leveled

name: The Island: Into the Mist
description: The Island: Into The Mist is a mystery adventure visual novel where every decision counts.

name: The Last Worker
description: The Last Worker is a first person narrative adventure centered around our struggle in an increasingly automated world. Combining a hand crafted art style with uniquely immersive gameplay mechanics in an epic setting, The Last Worker delivers an emotional, thought provoking and comedic story packaged with rich characters performed by an all-star cast.

name: Lumote: The Mastermote Chronicles
description: Meet Lumote, the squishiest bioluminescent creature, in this beautiful 3D puzzle platformer. Take control of the world’s inhabitants on a quest into the Great Depths to seize control from the Mastermote.

name: Sherlock Holmes: Chapter One - Deluxe Edition
description: Sherlock Holmes Chapter One Deluxe Edition includes a Season Pass with new quests: 'Saints and Sinners' DLC (available on release day), 'Mycroft's Pride' DLC (coming later), 'M for Mystery' DLC (coming later), 'Beyond A Joke' DLC (coming later).

name: UnMetal: UnDeluxe Edition
description:
UnMetal's a 2D stealth action-adventure that pays homage to the classics with a healthy dose of humor and satire. You play as Jesse Fox, who is definitely NOT an elite commando, under arrest for a crime he didn't commit, and must escape a covert military base.

The UnDeluxe Edition includes:
- The Game
- The Big Boom-Box Soundtrack

name: Rogue Lords: Blood Moon Edition
description:
The Blood Moon edition includes:
- The Game and the Supporter Pack
- Digital Artbook
- Original Soundtrack
- Moonlight set.

name: In Sound Mind: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: From the creators of the cult classic Nightmare House 2 comes In Sound Mind, a witty first-person psychological horror with frenetic puzzles and unique boss fights. In Sound Mind Digital Deluxe Edition includes the digital soundtrack by The Living Tombstone.

name: Dice Legacy: Deluxe Edition
description: Dice Legacy Deluxe Edition includes the wonderful original soundtrack that accompanies you throughout the game. Build a settlement and explore the ringworld in this dice-based survival city-builder.
